name: prometheus-site
description: Performance-forward monorepo for Qwik City web and Bun Elysia API services.

scripts.dev: pnpm -C apps/web dev & pnpm -C apps/api dev
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/api build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/web lint && pnpm -C apps/api lint
scripts.format: pnpm -C apps/web format && pnpm -C apps/api format
scripts.test: pnpm -C apps/web test && pnpm -C apps/api test
